name: City Skateboard Racing: True Xtreme Urban Street Skate Simulator Game
name_original: City Skateboard Racing: True Xtreme Urban Street Skate Simulator Game
description:
** EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** REALISTIC SKATEBOARDING GAME! **

Tear up the streets in this eXtreme Racing game. Ride your board downtown and weave in and out of traffic. Watch out, or you’ll end up like a pancake. Do you have what it takes?

Features:
-HD 3D graphics
-Realistic Physics
-Dynamic Traffic
